description: This file sets up an agent using the agno framework, configuring it with a Claude model and MCP server settings, then makes a request to print a response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent configured with a model and settings to interact with external services.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Claude model used within the agent.

classes.name: MCPServerConfiguration
classes.description: Configuration class for MCP server settings.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print a response from the agent based on a prompt.
